## Impact Overview
I built a full PX4/ROS 2/Gazebo simulation environment for the companyâ€™s autonomous underwater vehicle, enabling automated test scenarios without the hardware needing to touch the water. By shifting trial-and-error into simulation, I accelerated the development cycle and reduced physical testing, which costs both money and time. My simulation's accuracy was verified thorugh real worl testing which mirrored simulation results.

## What I owned {.unnumbered}

::: {layout-ncol="2"}

::: {.card .p-3}
**Real-time Force Visualization**
Reports forces acting on individual AUV components as they happen.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**High-Fidelity Physics**
Verified accurate buoyancy and interation physics with correctly modeled fins and motors.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**Advanced Telemetry**
Interfaced with QGroundControl for telemetry to enable world position tracking.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**Hardware Mirroring**
Equipped with the same sensor suite and sensor functionality as the physical AUV.
:::

::: {.card .p-3}
**World and Model Development**
Built custom ocean world and 1:1 simulated AUV model.
:::
